A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Does it live up to the pre-release hype\, that this might be the best Star Wars movie ever made? No\, not at all. It's decent film compared to the rest of the series\, and a good movie overall. It feels a little unfocused at times\, but there the climactic moments are wonderful and help make up for the discombobulation.  I feel like many of the fans are saying they didn't like it\, because it was hyped up so much and when critics say something is on par with the Empire Strikes Back\, it can be hard not to be disappointed when it fails to deliver anything other than a masterpiece of the ages.
